Good to know

Important phone numbers:

Fire Department and Ambulance:

112

Police:

110

More important numbers are available at www.german-business-etiquette.com

Power supply

The power supply runs at 230V/50Hz

Tipping

Taxi driver: 5%-10% (at least €1)

Housekeeping: €1-2 per day

Carrying luggage: €1 per piece

Public toilet attendants: €0.10-0.50

Delivery Services: 5%-10% (at least €1)

(source: http://wikitravel.org/en/Germany)

General information about Germany

A good summary about need to know stuff is collected at wikitravel.org and hoteltravel.com

Non Smoking laws

Non smoking rules are very strict in Germany see that info page for more info

Alcohol

To learn more about the alcohol rules in germany visit: Wikipedia

Drug policy

To learn more about the drug rules in germany visit: Wikipedia
